item.title: Lens
item.description: I just made my first camera lens in Adobe Illustrator. Following the awesome tutorial on Tuts+, it took me about two hours to complete. I’ve got lots of improving to do, but I’ve always wanted to learn how to make something this intricate and downright cool. Illustration is a world I’ve long looked at, but never really set foot in like I did with web design. However, after only two hours working on the camera lens, I realized that I have a strong passion for this type of design.
